description: Anonymized fire event identifier (stable random remap, no temporal meaning)

Time from t0+5h until fire comes within 5km of evac zone (hours). For censored events (never hit within 72h), this is the last observed time within the window (â‰¤ 72). Used for training survival models.
Event indicator: 1 if fire hit within 72h, 0 if censored (never hit)
Number of perimeters within first 5 hours
Time span between first and last perimeter (hours)
Flag: 1 if dt < 0.5h or only 1 perimeter, else 0
Minimum distance to nearest evac zone centroid (meters)
Speed at which fire is closing distance to evac zone (m/hour, positive = closing)
Absolute alignment between fire motion and evac direction (0-1, higher = more aligned)
Hour of day when fire started (0-23)
